name: 1775: Rebellion
summary: Command the armies of the British Redcoats, English Loyalists, German Hessians, American Regulars, Patriots, French Regulars and Native Americans to decide the fate of the Americas!

name: 17 Ways To Not Die (Or Not, IDK): Interactive Movie
summary: 17 Ways Not to Die is a movie, first and foremost. A movie in which you can influence what happens on the screen. There are 17 endings, or not endings, or not 17, I don't know. I don't care.

name: 17 Seconds VR
summary:
Prepare for a heart-pounding race against time in this intense shooting game. The clock is ticking: wipe out all enemies in under 17 seconds or face defeat.

You have a pistol with a few bullets available, plus some melee weapons on a table. Please pick them up and use them wisely. When you finish the bullets in the gun, you can throw your weapons at the enemies. Do not kill innocents, otherwise it'll be game over.

You can see an old computer on the right side of each area. Insert the floppy disk labelled "EXTRA BULLETS", grab the muse and play a cute minimalistic game to gain an extra bullet every 50 points reached

name: 17Shapes
summary: It's harder than it looks - A relaxing, stressful, satisfying, and infuriating game where you need to push shapes into a hole. Don't let the simplicity deceive you. It's not as easy as it sounds. 17 shapes on the screen means game over!

name: 17 MPH
summary: Make your way through unusual off-road challenges with advanced suspension physics and weirdly shaped wheels, but don't go below 17 miles per hour or you will regret it.

name: 1711 Ireland: A Witch's Fate
summary: 1711 Ireland: A Witch's Fate is a choice-driven exploration game in which you play the role of a investigator following the 18th century witch trial at Islandmagee, Ireland. Investigate Ireland's last witch trial. Discover fear, faith, and the line between truth and myth

name: 17 Fighters
summary: Deck-building card game, defeat 17 fighters one by one!

name: 17 Bucks: Floor 1
summary: 17 Bucks is a Friday Night Funkin' mod centering around internet personas and original characters.

name: 17.waves
summary: 17.waves is an online co-op tower defense game for up to four players. Strategize with your teammates to build, upgrade, and maintain your towers to defend your base from hordes of invading aliens.

177 is the number of the Japanese criminal legislation paragraph that forbids rape. The game, however, does just the opposite: it puts the player in control of a man who must pursue a fleeing young girl and rape her.

The game has two gameplay modes. The first is a side-scrolling arcade sequence during which the player has to prevent the girl from reaching her house, and avoid the hazards on the protagonist's way. These include stones, barriers, animals such as dogs and turtles, etc., and can be avoided by destroying or jumping over them. The protagonist runs automatically, but the player can increase or decrease the distance between him and the running girl. In order to make the girl choose the wrong way and fail to find her house, the protagonist throws stones at her (these can also be used to kill animals and destroy obstacles).

After the protagonist has caught the girl, the game switches into sex simulation. The player pushes arrow keys in a specific order to correspond with the protagonist's movements. The goal is to sexually satisfy the girl. If the player fails, the protagonist is arrested; if he succeeds, the girl marries the protagonist.
